11.content:
It is a new day and your mother forces you to join the S.W.A.P team which is a Canadian non-profit organization that organizes and facilitates large-scale clothing swaps.
What you did not know was that you were going to be a test subject for them.
11.title: Male

111.content: you get turned into your sister or a teenage girl at your shcool
111.title: You get swapped

choices: Go up to her and say hi
She comes up to you and starts screaming at you until you explain what happened
1111.content: You black out for a while.when you wake up you head towards the mirror and looking back at you wasn't you it was that cute girl in year 9 (grade 9 if your american) named lily you screamed at S.W.A.P about this but realise not just your body had changed but so did your voice.when you returned to school today you see lily in your body
1111.title: teenage girl

1113.content: you get turned into your mother or your teacher
1113.title: other

112.content:
"Forget it mom, I'm NOT working for a stupid organization like that, who the hell spends their time facilitating clothing swaps?" you told your mother, much to her chagrin. "And what does that even mean? Clothing swaps?? I'm outta here!" you grumbled.

"But I already signed you up young man, they'll come looking for you" your mom replied.

"Oh yeah, who are they...the police?" you scoffed. "Catch you later mom, I'm going out with my friends" you continued, before exiting the house and heading straight down to the mall. Little did you know, that at that very moment, a satellite orbiting high above the Earth was zeroing in on your position. The S.W.A.P agents had already located you. Once it was clear that you weren't going to report to them, they set a process in motion and the satellite began to power up.

**************

At the mall there were a lot of people, even more than usual, and it took you a while to locate your friends. But eventually you did:

Jack, 15, older than you by a few months and your best friend.

Becky, 14, Jack's girlfriend and also one of your friends.

Thomas, 14, fairly unpopular kid at school who you have taken into your little 'gang', he wears glasses.

Beatrice, 15, bit of a bookworm, has a secret crush on you but you have no idea.

Sally, 14, a little stuck-up due to her family being quite wealthy, but she's still friendly to you.

**************

"Hey guys, what's up?" you greeted you friends, after walking up to them.
112.title: You decide not to go there and hang out with yo...

choices: You swap with Beatrice or Sally
1123.title: Your 'punishment' is dished out.

info.brief_description: The S.W.A.P. Team is a cover. They actually change people for fun.
info.description:
The S.W.A.P. Team is a Canadian non-profit organization that organizes and facilitates large-scale clothing swaps. However, this is merely a cover as they actually change people for fun.
S-Swapping
W-with
A-Another
P-Person


You are a normal kid. That is until your mother made you join The S.W.A.P. Team.
Strange things start happening and you decide to get involved.



A few characters:
You (male): You are a 14 year old guy. Short blond hair, medium build
You (female): you are a 14 year old girl. Log flowing blond hair, nice figure

Your mother: Helen. A widow living alone. She has a nice figure and loves you a lot
Your sister: Melody. Adores her elder sibling


Feel free to add new characters if you deem fit but make sure the story stays in your point of view
Also this is a swapping story so no weight gain or loss, no inflation and no height changes.
Lastly, have fun
